Context:
Changes to LLC Laptop Loan Policy effective December 18, 2023. Students can print or copy in full colour or black and white using card-operated printers/copiers at all locations. Specialized printing includes use of George Brown College student photo ID or library cards as print/copier cards. All LLC locations are now cashless, allowing funds to be added to student photo ID or library card at the Help Desk in person using debit or credit, or adding funds to LLC Print account for remote/wireless printing. Refunds for any remaining balances can be claimed by completing a Print/Copy Refund Request form in person during business hours.

Printing options: black and white, colour, printing with Premium Paper, and plotting. For more information on land acknowledgment, sign up for updates about application deadlines, college news, upcoming events, tours, etc. Contact 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559 or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Visit Social Media Hub for more information.

Note: Information contained in this website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
